schema:name: UK government organisations
schema:description: The list of organisation is for internal use only. Once we have a canonical source for all organisations relevant to the API Catalogue, this list will change.

columns.name: id
columns.schema:description: The unique identifier for the organisation

columns.name: alternateName
columns.schema:description: The name or acronym the organisation is commonly referred as

columns.name: url
columns.schema:description: The canonical URL for the organisation
